CHAT.comment: THOMAS CARR, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES A. ROTHFELD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
